Title: 🎬 #23_serpnya #Day_of_Sovereign_Prapor_Ukraine 🇺🇦 Sovereign_Pr...
Description: #23_serpnya#Day_of_Sovereign_Prapor_Ukraine🇺🇦 Sovereign_Prapor_of Ukraine! Symbol of our courage and rich struggle! Once again, the order is on the pixels covered by the brood and on the dress uniform. Above combat positions and in light arenas. On armored cars that go to the offensive, and on the wings of combat aircraft that carry gifts to the occupiers. They proudly fly in Vinnytsia, Sumy and Kherson, Kharkiv and Lviv... That, as a symbol of the inevitable victory of Ukraine - over the settlements of Kursk region ! We know the price of spending... The Ukrainian ensign is still standing at the gates of Donetsk and Lugansk. We are confident and confident that everything is possible, and the blue and yellow colors have turned to all Ukrainian places! Today, 23 September, Ukrposhta will introduce a postage stamp - Everything will be UA! - which will remind the Ukrainians, what we are obligated to see and try and double the size of the Ukrainian land! Holy shit, Ukraine! Eternal shana for the skin, who, having died, defending blue-yellow colors! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 Today, on the Day of the State Ensign of Ukraine, we are creat...
Description: Today, on the Day of the State Ensign of Ukraine, we are creating a symbol that unites Ukrainians around the world. The blue and yellow banner is a symbol of our national dignity, freedom and independence. With the onset of Russia’s full-scale war against Ukraine, the sovereign ensign acquired special significance for aviators. Having become a symbol of the struggle for freedom and sovereignty, it has increased the strength of the most important moments. The presence of round blue-yellow markings on the wings of Ukrainian flying aircraft is an important element of identification in the wind, which allows you to quickly identify Ukrainian flying aircraft from enemies. The ensign on board the aircraft is a sign that the pilot is ready to give all his strength for the protection of Ukraine, its independence and the future. The message of the Ukrainian aviators in the future is that we will be able to bring peace to the native land closer. of millions of Ukrainians. Vіn reminds us about the day, about those who at the same time we will overcome any difficulties and choose the right to a happy and happy future. HAPPY DAY OF THE AUTHORITY OF UKRAINE!🇺🇦📸✍🏻 114 Brigade technical aviation

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 14 STRIKE UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On September 23, 2024, t...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 14 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 23, 2024, the enemy attacked the enemy with ballistic missiles -Iskander-M-/KN-2 3 from Voronezk region and 16th attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type (launch areas - Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation).💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle by aviation, radio electronic warfare units and the destruction of mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, 14 were killed unit-. Two more - locationally spent, information was not found until the ruins. Anti-violent defense was carried out in the Cherkassy, ​​Kirovograd, Poltava and Sumy regions. For the combat work! HIGH PRIOR OF UKRAINE!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander Military Forces Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
